text: Mario Harte (born 30 August 1988) is a Barbadian international footballer who plays as a Midfielder. He is currently playing for UWI Blackbirds. He was the top scorers during the 2016 Barbados Premier Division season. ==International career== ===International goals=== :Scores and results list the Barbados's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" ! # !!
